item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello World!~ Hello! My name is Daryl (in case you did not catch that on the left pane haha). This is my first attempt at building my own website. Wellâ€¦ I did not build it from scratch myself. I used a static site generator called Hugo. I plan to use this site as a personal blog to write down my thoughts. I may also post articles that I find interesting from time to time.
